Module

NetGetX

Sets default paths for NGINX and other directories if they are not already set.

View Source src/modules/NetGetX/config/i_DefaultNetGetX.js, line 14

The updated user configuration object.
Promise.<Object>

View Source src/modules/NetGetX/config/NginxPaths.js, line 15

An object containing paths to the NGINX configuration file and its base directory or null values if not found.
object
Parameters:
Name Type Description
xConfig object The user configuration object.
nginxConfigPath string The NGINX configuration path to be set.
nginxBasePath string The NGINX base path to be set.
